original: BRANDAHL, Erik Helge, Direktör, Göteborg, f Gbg 13/2 01, gm Vera Wennerlund. Gbgs hdlsinst. Anst h Sixten & Cassey Ltd, London, 20—22, AB Leon Andréns reseff.fabr, Mölndal, 23, eg fma Erik B o Co, Mölndal, sed. 24. Resor: Engl o kontinenten. Hobbies: Tennis, teater, tidningsläsning.
translated: BRANDAHL, Erik Helge, Director, Gothenburg, b Gbg 13/2 01, m Vera Wennerlund. Gbg Commerce Institute. Employed at Sixten & Cassey Ltd, London, 20—22, AB Leon Andréns travel textile factory, Mölndal, 23, self-employed at Erik B and Co, Mölndal, since 24. Travels: England and the continent. Hobbies: Tennis, theater, reading newspapers.

structured.name: Erik Helge Brandahl

organization.name: AB Leon Andréns travel textile factory

structured.description: Swedish director born on February 13, 1901, in Gothenburg. Married to Vera Wennerlund. He studied at the Gothenburg Commerce Institute. Erik worked as a director at Sixten & Cassey Ltd in London from 1920 to 1922. He then joined AB Leon Andréns travel textile factory in Mölndal in 1923. Since 1924, Erik has been self-employed at Erik B and Co, also in Mölndal. He has traveled extensively to England and the continent. His hobbies include playing tennis, attending theater performances, and reading newspapers.
